settings.name: content
settings.value:
Welcome to our tool, designed as an extension for Visual Studio Code and built on top of the Impact Framework. Our mission is to help developers create software that's efficient, secure, and environmentally friendly.

In a world increasingly aware of its environmental footprint, we believe that even the software development industry has a role to play in creating a sustainable future. That's why we've created this tool, participating in the Carbon Hack 2024 Hackathon, to challenge and revolutionize the way we understand and measure the environmental impact of software.
settings.computedValue:
Welcome to our tool, designed as an extension for Visual Studio Code and built on top of the Impact Framework. Our mission is to help developers create software that's efficient, secure, and environmentally friendly.

In a world increasingly aware of its environmental footprint, we believe that even the software development industry has a role to play in creating a sustainable future. That's why we've created this tool, participating in the Carbon Hack 2024 Hackathon, to challenge and revolutionize the way we understand and measure the environmental impact of software.

settings.name: content
settings.value:
Our tool simplifies the coding process, reduces duplication, and identifies potential security vulnerabilities - all in an effort to make software development more sustainable. By analyzing and providing insights into the complexity of your code, our tool encourages developers to write simpler, more straightforward code. Not only does this make your software more efficient, but it also reduces the time and resources required to maintain it, contributing to waste reduction.

Furthermore, by identifying and eliminating duplicate code, our tool helps to make your software more efficient and less prone to errors. And with the feature of identifying potential security vulnerabilities, our tool aids in preventing breaches that would require additional resources to fix, further promoting efficiency and reduction of waste.

Initially, our tool supports Python, one of the most popular programming languages. However, we have plans to extend this support to all programming languages, with the aim to help developers worldwide create greener, less wasteful software.

settings.name: content
settings.value: In the following sections, you will find detailed information about how to install and use our tool, as well as how it utilizes the Impact Framework to measure the environmental impact of software. We hope you find our tool useful in your journey towards more sustainable software development.
